## Remirror.getDerivedStateFromProps() method

This is needed to manage the controlled component `value` prop and copy it to the components state for internal usage.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getDerivedStateFromProps(props: RemirrorProps, state: RemirrorState): RemirrorState | null;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  props | <code>RemirrorProps</code> |  |
|  state | <code>RemirrorState</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`RemirrorState | null`
